text: My experience with growing a strawberry is ...

details.story: I grew a strawberry in my yard but it was not so good. We have to water it every day and it takes a long time to grow. I harvested it after 3 months and it was not tasty at all. We suspect it has to do with the fact that we forgot to use fertilizer. We will consider trying again next year.
tips: Use a good fertilizer (this is a must!)

comments.text: I agree with you! I also grew a strawberry and it was good because we used a lot of fertilizer. Also make sure you use a good soil and keep pests away.
